alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:28AM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with a chance of freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph near passes. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Chance of freezing rain mainly Thursday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
